.. _whatsnew-index:

#####################
 What's New in RTMPy
#####################

The "What's New in RTMPy" series of essays takes tours through the most
important changes between RTMPy versions.  They are a "must read" for
anyone wishing to stay up-to-date after a new release.

   :maxdepth: 2

   0.1.rst
